# balanceQuery

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function balanceQuery(sdk: RequiredParam<ThirdwebSDK>): {
  queryKey: readonly [
    "__tw__",
    "sol",
    RequiredParam<import("@thirdweb-dev/sdk/solana").Network>,
    "wallet-balance",
    {
      readonly address: string | undefined;
    },
  ];
  queryFn: () => Promise<{
    value: string;
    displayValue: string;
  }>;
  enabled: boolean;
};
```

| Parameter | Type                                                         | Description |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| sdk       | [RequiredParam](./react.requiredparam.md)&lt;ThirdwebSDK&gt; |             |
